Name: Breakout
About the game: Breakout is the low poly, First-Person 'the floor is lava' platformer that will prove how good your reflexes really are. Accept the challenge: run, jump, crouch and use special abilities to dodge the obstacles in order to complete each level, put your name on the top of the leader boards and, the most important part, have fun. Key features: A Campaign mode with 70 levels Special abilities like: Slow Motion, Grappling Hook, Jetpack and many more Online leader boards for all levels so everyone can see how skilled you are Minimalist visuals that help you focus on what's important No paid DLCs, only free updates Enjoyable by a wide variety of player skill since most players, casuals or not, should be able to complete the levels A fresh Holidays update that adds 50 new levels, 2 new special abilities, new obstacles and mechanics Feedback, suggestions and questions, regarding the current or future content, are highly appreciated by the developer. Don't hesitate to express your thoughts, join our Discord !
